schema.name: Position_in_organization_arm
schema.description: The definition of a position in an organization and the relationships between positions and organizations.

type.name: person_or_organization
type.description: The person_or_organization select type provides a mechanism to allow either a person or an organization to hold a position.

entity.name: Person_or_organization_in_position
entity.description:
A person or organization may hold more than one position within an organization or organizations.
A person can hold two positions in an organization: Production Manager and Safety Officier.
A position in an organization can be held by more than one person or organization.
Two people can hold the same position in a job-share scheme.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the person or organization in the position.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the person or organization in position is known.

explicit.name: person_or_organization
explicit.description: The person or organization who holds the position.

explicit.name: position
explicit.description: The position that is held by the person or organization.

entity.name: Position
entity.description:
A position is a function or job performed by a person. It defines responsibilities and activities. A position that is not fulfilled by a person is a vacancy.
Company Director
Service Engineer

explicit.name: address
explicit.description: The address of the position.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the position.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the position is known.

explicit.name: position_context
explicit.description: The position that is used by the organization.

explicit.name: position_type
explicit.description: The type of position.

entity.name: Position_assignment
entity.description: A position_assignment is an association of an position with activity or product data.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The activity or product data to which the position is assigned

explicit.name: position
explicit.description: The position that is to be associated with the activity or product data.

explicit.name: role
explicit.description: The role in which the position is operating with respect to the activity or product data

entity.name: Position_group
entity.description:
A group collecting people in their positions to cooperate in an assignment.
People representing utility companies who cooperate with each other to coordinate road works.

entity.name: Position_group_relationship
entity.description: The participation of a position in a group.

explicit.name: group
explicit.description: The group of positions.

explicit.name: position
explicit.description: The position that belongs to the group.

entity.name: Position_relationship
entity.description:
Examples of relationships between positions are
Superior / Subordinate
Superceded by

explicit.name: organization
explicit.description: The organization that is defines the direct supervision relationship.

explicit.name: related_position
explicit.description: The position that is the child of the relationship.

explicit.name: relating_position
explicit.description: The position that is parent of the relationship.

entity.name: Position_role
entity.description: The role performed by the position.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the role.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the role is known.

entity.name: Position_type
entity.description:
A position type is a recognized kind of position.
Chief Executive Officer
Manager
Service engineer
Programmer
Aircraft engineering technician propulsion

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the type of position.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the type of position is known.

entity.name: Position_type_in_organization
entity.description:
A position type as used in a particular organization.
A commerical organization may use the position type 'service engineer', while a militaty organization may use the position type 'corporal' for the same position type.
This is a mechanism to scope position types to organizations.

explicit.name: organization
explicit.description: The organization that uses the type of position.

explicit.name: position_type
explicit.description: The type of position that is used by the organization.

entity.name: Type_of_person_in_position_type
entity.description: The type of person who could fill the type of position.

explicit.name: position_type
explicit.description: The type of position that is to be filled by a type of person.

explicit.name: type_of_person
explicit.description: The type of person who fills the type of position.
